title: Contract with debt
creator_credit: Video Projects, Penny Roberts and Tony Wright
brief_description: Budget or bust! An important and relevant presentation of money matters as they are seen by teenagers. Using situations and dialogues which are a part of any teenager’s life the video presents a lively and amusing story of Amanda and Krystal as they learn about financial matters the hard way.
